block.forgemaster.attacca_shard.desc: A shard of a legendary sword, heat pulses through it
item.forgemaster.broken_attacca.desc: Half of the legendary sword, the lone gear clicks loudly without its partner
item.forgemaster.attacca.desc: A legendary sword forged by [cool text thingy]
enchantment.forgemaster.fire_engine.desc: Consumes charge to shoot fireballs in a ring around the wielder
enchantment.forgemaster.coolant_system.d: Grants you fire resistance when you attack
